title: Settings
text: The Settings tab reveals a huge array of options that are made available specifically for customizing the plots shown in the Browser. While the Browser plots usually try to use sensible default options, sometimes a more customized look is needed. In general, data for any experiment can be exported in a CSV format and re-plotted in external software; however, if only a slight modification is needed then sometimes this can be accomplished by changing the Settings. Settings can be used if they are helpful, but the default options may be best in many cases.
